Issue.creator: mfford
Issue.description: Create a 0-8 branch in sawtooth-core such that Sawtooth 0.8 can be used as a stable platform, and update the master branch's version numbers to represent Sawtooth 0.9. All Sawtooth 1.0 API stability changes will occur in master, not the 0-8 branch. In addition, update the CI Infrastructure to support both 0.8 and 0.9, including producing both 0.8 and 0.9 deb files and docker images.
